title: Chasing a low health champ that just stays out of reach.

replies.body: Don't worry guys, you can see the actual moment he kills him [here](https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ)
:| I can't believe I fell for it.
https://media.giphy.com/media/APcFiiTrG0x2/giphy.gif
How do you attach links to a part of the sentence like that?
On my phone I switched to the full site, then marked the text I want it to show, and clicked on the option between the quote and the ~~deleted text~~, after that I copied the link to the text bar.

[Test](http://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0093/4362/products/iStock_000019800224Small_1_1024x1024.jpg%3Fv%3D1345837342)

Thank you
https://media.giphy.com/media/GCLlQnV7wzKLu/giphy.gif
That sudden turn scared the shit out of me

Epic.

Such turn, such triggered finger.

And cue the Yakety Sax chase music!
######Set speed to 1.25 for more hilariousness! EDIT: 1.25 speed seems best for funnies.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S700Rd4iZfs

I DARED TO SET IT TO 2!!!!

It wasn't as funny at 2...
Awe darn =/ Was hoping it would be. Sorry.
yeah even 1.5 lost too much of it.  I found that 1.25 was by far the more enjoyable setting.
Well then. Good to know.
I set it to .5. that's how this works right?

I checked this too and I could see this leading to interesting overs of other songs.
Can't think of any off the top of my head but that was the thought I had.
Got go the other direction dood!
